mapper.select: SELECT db.dashboard_id, db.report_detail_id, db.result_summary, db.brand_rate1, db.brand_rate2, db.brand_rank, db.domain_rate1, db.domain_rate2, db.brand_mention, rd.ai_type, rd.json_data FROM dashboard db JOIN report_detail rd ON db.report_detail_id = rd.report_detail_id WHERE rd.report_id = #{reportId}
